org.openlcb.can

Class NIDa

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.can.NIDa

  • public class NIDa
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of Node ID Alias assignment computation. This class merely does computations, and doesn't control sending and receiving of CAN frames.
    Author:
    Bob Jacobsen Copyright 2009, 2010

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NIDa(NodeID nid)

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected int computeAliasFromGenerator()
      Reduce the current generator value to an alias value.
      protected void forceAliasValue(int alias)
      For use in testing subclasses only, this forces the current alias to a specific value.
      protected void forceSeedValue(long seed1, long seed2)
      For use in testing subclasses only, this forces the current seed to a specific value.
      int getNIDa() 
      protected void loadSeed(NodeID nid)
      Algorithm to produce seed from the six bytes of a node ID.
      void nextAlias()
      Update to the next alias in the series

      Advance the sequence generator by one step.

        public NIDa(NodeID nid)

    • Method Detail

      • getNIDa

        public int getNIDa()

      • nextAlias

        public void nextAlias()
        Update to the next alias in the series

      • forceSeedValue

        protected void forceSeedValue(long seed1,
                              long seed2)
        For use in testing subclasses only, this forces the current seed to a specific value. In the process, it updates the alias to the value implied by this seed.

      • forceAliasValue

        protected void forceAliasValue(int alias)
        For use in testing subclasses only, this forces the current alias to a specific value. It does not change the seed.

      • loadSeed

        protected void loadSeed(NodeID nid)
        Algorithm to produce seed from the six bytes of a node ID.

        Generally, it's easiest to work with the bytes of the ID. The MSB is id[0].

      • stepGenerator

        protected void stepGenerator()
        Advance the sequence generator by one step.

      • computeAliasFromGenerator

        protected int computeAliasFromGenerator()
        Reduce the current generator value to an alias value.
